description: BEMI stands for Be Milio—the manifestation of wealth and the thiccest thug on MvX, building a multi-billion cabal while normoids cope and seethe. We’re here to transcend ego, stack karmic points, and pull in cheddar from the poors to fuel our fast cars, designer drip, and lavish lifestyle. Aura bulletproof and spirituality networked. We are BEMILIONAIREs.
